reviewText: This DVD is very informative and easy to follow.  No fancy or expensive equipment is necessary for anyone to create lovely rosary beads.  There are several variations and lots of opportunity to add your own creative touch.  My original DVD was faulty  and the seller gets an A+ in customer service.  The product was replaced without any hassle.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this DVD to anyone with an interest in creating unique rosary beads, nor would I hesitate to buy another product from this company.

I'd llike to say this is a really nice DVD. But it froze up on me and I couldn't get past the problem so I haven't seen the whole thing yet.  But the rosaries are beautiful. I  already have figured out a much easier way to make the roses, however, the ideas on the dvd are inspiring.
